Insight: Ahead of election, Pakistan seals plan to sell national airlineAhead of elections next week, Pakistan's caretaker administration is making binding plans for a new government to sell loss-making Pakistan International Airlines , according to the minister in charge of the process and other officials. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 03:31:03 GMT AGCTS75H3JPTNCQ2SL47FLIBAY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/ahead-election-pakistan-seals-plan-sell-national-airline-2024-02-02/Asif Shahzad商业航空航天与国防
Trudeau condemns mosque attack, says Islamophobia 'has no place' in CanadaCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Thursday condemned an attack against a mosque in the city of Mississauga in Ontario province, which is being probed as a hate crime and which rights advocates described as being part of a rise in Islamophobia. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 03:15:21 GMT KJ2A3ZSVB5NE7K2WZW6GWGEO5I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/trudeau-condemns-mosque-attack-says-islamophobia-has-no-place-canada-2024-02-02/Kanishka Singh世界美洲
Four weeks after sailing for Israel, 16,000 sheep and cattle remain in limbo aboard shipAround 16,000 livestock remained in limbo aboard an export ship at an Australian port on Friday, having set sail for Israel exactly four weeks ago only to abandon a passage through the Red Sea and be ordered home by the Australian government. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 03:05:53 GMT G7SWCGXI3BIYHFEK6KGMMLDFCA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/four-weeks-after-sailing-israel-16000-sheep-cattle-remain-limbo-aboard-ship-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
Indonesia president says cabinet working normally, amid reports of discontentIndonesia President Joko Widodo said on Friday his cabinet was working normally, amid reports of discontent among his ministers. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 02:57:16 GMT RI742QMDP5PF3ODXABJUR2XYZE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-president-says-cabinet-working-normally-amid-reports-of-discontent-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
More than 100 Myanmar migrants flee Malaysian detention centre, one deadAn undocumented migrant from Myanmar has died in a road accident while fleeing an immigration detention centre with over a hundred others in Malaysia late Thursday, officials said. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 02:50:36 GMT 3PTFH2GGMNNIFPEYEBRXKC42MSM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/more-than-100-myanmar-migrants-flee-malaysian-detention-centre-one-dead-2024-02-02/Reuters世界亚太地区
IMF, Egypt agree on 'main policy elements' of economic reform programmeThe International Monetary Fund said on Thursday it had agreed with Egypt on the key policy components of an economic reform programme, in a further sign that a final deal to augment the country's $3 billion loan is nearing completion. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 01:07:25 GMT QKYG23RA4NILBL4ENY4ZDRBBQU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/imf-egypt-agree-main-policy-elements-economic-reform-program-2024-02-02/Reuters世界非洲
Japan's message for Donald Trump: don't cut a deal with ChinaJapan has been trying to send a message to US presidential hopeful Donald Trump: don't try to strike any deal with China that could upend years of collective efforts to rein in Beijing. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 01:04:53 GMT OPMFU3OYNBIYDCFHL2UYYX3KBE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-message-donald-trump-dont-cut-deal-with-china-2024-02-02/John Geddie, Tim Kelly, Yoshifumi Takemoto世界亚太地区
Australian police say no evidence of offensive slogan at pro-Palestinian protestAustralian police said on Friday a forensic analysis did not find evidence pro-Palestinian protesters chanted "gas the Jews" outside the Sydney Opera House last year, but the investigation found some used anti-Semitic slogans. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 00:55:02 GMT TGDK3TKAZFPV5GTHCUBHAOR3SQ https://www.reuters.com/world/australian-police-say-no-evidence-offective-slogan-pro-palestinian-protest-2024-02-02/Reuters世界
Exclusive: World Bank to offer countries access to emergency funds from existing loansThe World Bank on Thursday said it approved new initiatives to allow member countries hit by natural disasters and other shocks to quickly access emergency funds from their existing loan programs to help them respond to an increasingly crisis-prone world. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 00:10:51 GMT DJVJTVQDNJOZLGL3FS2T3EVOPE https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/world-bank-offer-countries-access-emergency-funds-existing-loans-2024-02-02/David Lawder商业环境
Panama ex-president's return to office endangered by graft sentencePanama's ex-president Ricardo Martinelli is hoping to convince voters to give him a second chance in an election on May 5, but a decade-long prison sentence for money laundering could imperil his run. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 00:05:17 GMT 7P6TOHOWAROZLGVXI4ID6WRAHQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/panama-ex-presidents-return-office-endangered-by-graft-sentence-2024-02-02/Valentine Hilaire, Elida Moreno世界美洲
World Court to rule on jurisdiction in Russia-Ukraine genocide caseThe United Nations' highest court will rule Friday if a case in which Ukraine has accused Russia of violating international law, by saying its invasion was launched to stop an alleged genocide, can move forward. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 00:04:43 GMT 3VIGNHXNO5K3RD脚SABVVY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/world-court-rule-jurisdiction-Russia-ukraine-genocide-case-2024-02-02/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界欧洲
